apa duk windinne.

ee kalaye janatha wimukthi peramune thrasthawadaya thula ‘drohiyata’ himi kara dun danduwama wune maranaya bawath, ewani ‘drohiyekuge’ miniya ussagena ya yuthu wune danin pahalata ellena se bawata ema sanwidhanaya eda niyoga kota thibunu bawath mohu apata mathak kara deyi.
thawa duratath aya kiya sitiye “apita ru 250,000 wandi mudala thawama labune naha.
